nodes.text: it is hardly more than a business magazine by and for the defense industry.

If the defense industry is the sole sponsor of a magazine and if the magazine repeatedly refers to the developments made by the defense industry it is by definition hardly more than a business magazine by and for the defense industry.
The defense industry is the sole sponsor of the magazine  Seapower  and  it repeatedly refers to the developments made by the defense industry
these corporate sponsors basically are the defense industry

The list of  corporate sponsors  include (among its  Gold Medal members ) Lockheed-Martin Rockwell General Dynamics Grumman GE etc. with glossy full-page ads advertising their latest cutting-edge developments.
these corporate sponsors are the *only* advertisers in the magazine.
The articles themselves make repeated references to the technological developments of these corporations.
